arts.ttl: Man Utd receive improved Antony bid from Real Betis
arts.sum: Antony is free to leave Manchester United this month providing the terms of a loan deal are amenable to the Red Devils.

Deportivo Alaves sit just one point above the relegation zone, while Real Betis are in 10th. Alaves have failed to win since November 1st, and only Real Valladolid have conceded more goals than them....

arts.ttl: Barcelona have a new leader in minutes played this season after win over Real Betis
arts.sum: A member of Hansi Flick’s Barcelona squad took ownership of the title of most minutes played for the club this season, on Wednesday night. Barcelona, of course, were back in…

arts.ttl: Man United star linked with a move to Real Betis
arts.sum: Manchester United have had a tough season in the Premier League. Sitting in twelfth place with 21 games having been played, things need to change at Old Trafford. Ruben Anorim…

arts.ttl: Barcelona Sporting Director Deco to take legal action over Vitor Roque comments
arts.sum: Barcelona Sporting Director Deco has not taken kindly to comments made by ex-presidential candidate Victor Font, and plans to take legal action against him. Font insinuated that there was underhand business afoot during the deal to take Vitor Roque to the club during an interview this week.
